SEARCH
Package VotingSystem

Class RunElection

java.lang.Object
VotingSystem.RunElection
public class RunElection extends Object
Class meant to handle information before running the actual elections. Establishes what elections takes place, and establishes the name of the input and output (audit) files.

  • Constructor Details

    • RunElection

      public RunElection(ArrayList<String> filenames)
      Contructor for this class. The input can be null, as it will later be filled by the user in the start() function.
      Parameters:
      filenames - String ArrayList that represents the names of the files that contain the voting information.

  • Method Details

    • start

      public void start()
      Controller function that begins the program. Prompts the user for the names of files, and proceeds with creating the audit file, initializes the proper election class and runs it. Invoked in Main.java

    • promptUser

      private void promptUser(String prompt)
      Helper function for the start() function. Simply writes to terminal a message, prompting the user.
      Parameters:
      prompt - String that represents the message desired to be prompted to the user.

    • generateAuditFileName

      String generateAuditFileName(String elecType)
      Helper function for the start() function. Generates an appropriate filename for the audit file.
      Parameters:
      elecType - A String representing what type of election is taking place.
      Returns:
      String that is the full name of the soon-to-be audit file.

    • parseElectType

      String parseElectType()
      Helper function for the start() function, used in conjunture with the generateAuditFileName(). Reads first line of input file.
      Returns:
      String that represents the type of election.

    • runIR

      void runIR()
      Helper function for the start() function. Creates an IR election and runs its main methods to complete the program.

    • runCPL

      void runCPL()
      Helper function for the start() function. Creates a CPL election and runs its main methods to complete the program.

    • runPO

      void runPO()
      Helper function for the start() function. Creates a PO election and runs its main methods to complete the program.

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object

      public void setInput(ArrayList<FileReader> input)
      Setter for input
      Parameters:
      input - A FileReader that serves as the input

    • setAudit

      public void setAudit(FileWriter audit)
      Setter for audit
      Parameters:
      audit - FileWriter that represents the audit

    • setBr

      public void setBr(BufferedReader br)
      setter for br
      Parameters:
      br - BufferedReader that represents the br to read the file
